wikipedia_page.main: Neil Turner is an English former professional rugby league footballer who played in the 1980s and 1990s. He played at club level for  Doncaster (Heritage № 548) and Hull F.C., as a wing.Turner won the Rugby League Premiership final with Hull F.C. in 1991 after joining from Doncaster. He is a former detective with the South Yorkshire Police.
